name: Two Worlds (itch) (nebu soku)
description:
Top-down ⇔ Side-on

      Sokoban ⇔ Platformer

A sokoban-like where you have to create an environment for the inner world from the outer world.

Inspired by Ice path (Rosden Shadow), Ahoist Cratey (Thinky Collective), The Golem (Dom Camus) and YAPP2 (Artless Games).

Link to source code:

https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=eafdb99b13bd6232ac9c1b1eedb208f6
